No matter what you will be creating next, the design thinking methodology recommends you starting with the problem, never with a solution. A well-defined problem statement will guide you towards success.


This "Problem Statement" template is for all Design Thinkers practitioners out there who want to collaborate to sharpen the problem statement.

And this one is just the first of a series of templates focused on Design Thinking.
